reg:regulation.reg:title: Logging Tax Act Interest Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 207/2014, December 1, 2014]

bcl:section.bcl:text: Interest payable on amounts due to the government under the Logging Tax Act must be

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: calculated at the rate prescribed under the Interest Rate under Various Statutes Regulation, B.C. Reg. 386/92, and
calculated on a daily basis and compounded monthly.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Logging Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 277, sections 15 and 42]

change.changenote: Section 1 (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 207/2014, effective December 1, 2014.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: calculated on a daily basis and compounded every 30 days.
